bills.title: Revise property tax information required in preliminary budgets
Revise laws relate to disability parking
Revise laws related to air quality standards
Revise the unit ownership act to allow a lower threshold for common element changes
Provide exemption for certain owner-occupied residential property owned by persons 67 or older
Revise sales tax laws to provide for local option tax
Generally revise laws related to chiropractic practitioners
Create a limited remedy to remove unauthorized persons from residential property
Establish board of facility health care professionals
Generally revise laws related to electronic health care records
Institute the celebrate freedom week in Montana's public schools
Prohibit discriminatory action against persons providing adoption or foster care services
Require suspension of a driver's license if driving without insurance
Revise statement of purpose and implication for ballot issues
Providing for department of labor and industry and licensing boards to request health care information by administrative process
Revise labor laws relating to the medical assistance program
Generally revise laws relating to chiropractic practitioners
